features.featureTitle: Add the Google Search Console HTML verification file with the name 'google61423bcf1843cd2d.html' to the frontend public directory so that it is served as a static file at the path /google61423bcf1843cd2d.html. The file content must be exactly: 'google-site-verification: google61423bcf1843cd2d.html' as required by Google Search Console.
